text: Night Train to Paris is a 1964 American British thriller movie. It was directed by Robert Douglas. Actors include Leslie Nielsen, Aliza Gur, Dorinda Stevens, Eric Pohlmann, Jack Melford, and Hugh Latimer. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1964 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Night Train to Paris
